医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
发现新型分子信号通路在维持皮肤屏障中发挥关键作用我们的皮肤是人体最大的器官，是抵御感染和许多其他健康威胁的第一道防线。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Novel-molecular-signaling-pathway-found-to-play-a-crucial-role-in-maintaining-the-skin-barrier.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Novel-molecular-signaling-pathway-found-to-play-a-crucial-role-in-maintaining-the-skin-barrier.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0cd965d7-83b3-444b-b558-452b79327760 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 08:55:18 -0400 Novel molecular signaling pathway found to play a crucial role in maintaining the skin barrier
DeepPBS：精确预测蛋白质-DNA 结合特异性的几何 AI 模型南加州大学研究人员开发并发表在《自然方法》杂志上的一种新人工智能模型可以准确预测不同类型蛋白质如何与 DNA 结合，这一技术进步有望减少开发新药和其他医疗方法所需的时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/DeepPBS-A-geometric-AI-model-for-accurate-prediction-of- Protein-DNA-binding-specificity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/DeepPBS-A-geometric-AI-model-for-accurate-prediction-of- Protein-DNA-binding-specificity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fedecd4-2bf3-4b87-a317-05474eb1fc11 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 08:38:51 -0400 DeepPBS: A geometric AI model for accurate prediction of protein-DNA binding specificity
探索亚洲和西班牙裔社区的社会文化机构与健康之间的联系加州大学欧文分校最近领导的一项研究表明，种族飞地内社会文化机构的数量可能对亚裔美国人和西班牙裔移民的健康产生积极影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Exploring-the-link- Between-socioculture-institutions-and-health-in-majority-Asian-and-Hispanic-neighborhoods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Exploring-the-link- Between-socioculture-institutions-and-health-in-majority-Asian-and-Hispanic-neighborhoods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0de9da0-a9b2-4f59-93f8-6473e516a328 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 08:11:00 -0400 Exploring the link between sociocultural institutions and health in Asian and Hispanic neighborhoods
暴力痴呆症患者让疗养院工作人员和居民“吓得要死”丹·夏夫利 (Dan Shivery) 曾是一名银行行长，为怀俄明州科迪市的“七四”游行建造了花车，他喜欢和儿子们一起飞蝇钓鱼。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Violent-dementia-病人-leave-nursing-home-staffers-and-residents-e28098scared-to-deathe28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Violent-dementia-病人-leave-nursing-home-staffers-and-residents-e28098scared-to-deathe28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=500ba12f-4a60-40e3-bbe6-2d67b551c429 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 06:40:45 -0400 Violent dementia patients leave nursing home staffers and residents ‘scared to death’
Medi-Cal 的牙科护理差距：拔牙很容易，但种植牙却困难得多几年前，当鲍比·莫斯克因牙痛去社区诊所就诊时，他在马林县找不到愿意接受医疗补助做根管治疗的牙医。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Medi-Cale28099s-dental-care-gap-Getting-a-tooth-pulled-is-easy-e28094-much-harder-to-get-an-植入物.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Medi-Cale28099s-dental-care-gap-Getting-a-tooth-pulled-is-easy-e28094-much-harder-to-get-an-植入物.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0476f60d-ef5d-4fe3-b339-17bda04fec03 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 06:37:00 -0400 Medi-Cal’s dental care gap: Getting a tooth pulled is easy — much harder to get an implant
机器学习彻底改变了基因传递基因疗法有可能治愈遗传疾病，但安全有效地包装新基因并将其传递到特定细胞仍然是一个挑战。最常用的基因传递载体之一——腺相关病毒（AAV）的现有设计方法通常缓慢且低效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Machine-learning-revolutionizes-gene-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Machine-learning-revolutionizes-gene-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6dd4bd0-a789-4d71-a864-7556304c443e Fri, 09 Aug 2024 01:36:02 -0400 Machine learning revolutionizes gene delivery
无透镜荧光检测系统提供高灵敏度的水质评估研究人员表明，不包含任何透镜的荧光检测系统可以对饮用水中的致命微生物进行高度灵敏的检测。随着进一步发展，新方法可以提供一种低成本且易于使用的方法来监测资源有限的环境（例如发展中国家或受灾害影响的地区）的水质。当需要快速获得水上安全结果时（例如巴黎奥运会期间强调的游泳项目），它也可能很有用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Lensless-luminance-detection-system-provides-highly-sensitive-water-quality-assessment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Lensless-luminance-detection-system-provides-highly-sensitive-water-quality-assessment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36ada82f-abd9-4852-a030-8a4d66046a75 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 01:34:50 -0400 Lensless fluorescence detection system provides highly sensitive water quality assessment
突破性研究揭示了 TIP60 在 DNA 获取和疾病机制中的作用为了转录基因中包含的信息或修复 DNA 中每天发生的数十个断裂，我们的酶必须能够直接访问 DNA 来发挥其功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Breakthrough-study-uncovers-TIP60e28099s-role-in-DNA-access-and-disease-mechanisms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Breakthrough-study-uncovers-TIP60e28099s-role-in-DNA-access-and-disease-mechanisms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc22c434-0ed6-4b7f-be8f-0a2befd56b8b Fri, 09 Aug 2024 01:18:49 -0400 Breakthrough study uncovers TIP60’s role in DNA access and disease mechanisms
怀孕期间的炎症影响儿童神经发育当一个人受伤或感染时，身体的免疫系统会通过炎症反应来开始愈合过程。然而，炎症也可能发生在不太有益的情况下——例如，当一个人经历心理压力或持续食用富含糖、脂肪和加工食品的不良饮食时。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Inflammation-during-pregnancy-impacts-child-neurodevelopment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Inflammation-during-pregnancy-impacts-child-neurodevelopment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3dcbb62-c984-4f2d-bb8d-54972c3954cd Fri, 09 Aug 2024 01:10:58 -0400 Inflammation during pregnancy impacts child neurodevelopment
密歇根大学全国民意调查显示 30% 的 50 岁和 60 岁成年人是看护者根据密歇根大学全国健康老龄化民意调查的最新结果，超过四分之一的 50 岁及以上的人帮助照顾至少一名有健康问题或残疾的家庭成员或朋友。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/University-of-Michigan-National-Poll-reveals-3025-of-adults-in-50s-and-60s-are-caregivers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/University-of-Michigan-National-Poll-reveals-3025-of-adults-in-50s-and-60s-are-caregivers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c5039ff-baff-484c-95b3-55b4365704e7 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 01:04:09 -0400 University of Michigan National Poll reveals 30% of adults in 50s and 60s are caregivers
